::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse recieves the transmission. Frowning, she taps a few 
buttons, sending a transmission to DrillBit.

"DrillBit, Megatron wants some of my mechfluid, er, energon, so that 
he can repair Hell Beast. What should I tell him?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> Ill stop....but I sure did have a good time. Oh, and you know how 
Kinger is 
> always complaining about moding? Yes, well, in the past several 
posts he has 
> said that Hell Beast is dead. I think that qualifies as a mode.
> 
>     The Virus Scanner loacted the Virus. Indded it had surrounded 
the Spark 
> of Hell Beast. But, luckily this Virus Scanner could hold it off 
for awhile.
>     "Hmm....were going to need something to get rid of this Virus. 
And I just 
> know what will do the trick. Call Darkmouse." Megatron ordered. He 
was going 
> to beg her, do anything, for a Liquid Energon transfussion. Just 
enough to 
> kill the Virus off, not nearly as much as she has in her body.
>     Looking to the comm, Megatron says, "Darkmouse, This is 
Commander 
> MEgatron. I beseech you to allow us a quart of your Liquid Energon 
blood. 
> Senator Hell Beast is currently ill and needs it to combat a Virus. 
If you 
> allow us what we ask, we will grant you a favor. Please think our 
offer over. 
> Perhaps this could be the first steps to a treaty of peace between 
our 
> factions. Thank you agian." He said finally and logged off, hoping 
she would 
> accept.
